de.dviererbe.healthtrack.persistence

Class StepWidgetSQLiteRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • de.dviererbe.healthtrack.persistence.StepWidgetSQLiteRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisposable, IRepository<StepCountRecord,IStepWidgetRepository.RepositoryException>, IStepWidgetRepository, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class StepWidgetSQLiteRepository
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
implements IStepWidgetRepository
    Implements the IStepWidgetRepository interface using an SQLite database.

      • GetRecordsDescending

        public java.util.List<StepCountRecord> GetRecordsDescending(long offset,
                                                            int count)
                                                     throws IStepWidgetRepository.OffsetIsNegative,
                                                            IStepWidgetRepository.CountIsNotPositive,
                                                            IStepWidgetRepository.RepositoryDisposed,
                                                            IStepWidgetRepository.RepositoryException
        Gets a sequence of step count records with the maximum length of count in descending order sorted by the time of measurement beginning at the offset.
        Specified by:
        GetRecordsDescending in interface IRepository<StepCountRecord,IStepWidgetRepository.RepositoryException>
        Specified by:
        GetRecordsDescending in interface IStepWidgetRepository
        Parameters:
        offset - zero based n-th element in descending order where to begin reading records
        count - maximum number of record to be read from the repository
        Returns:
        read sequence of step count records
        Throws:
        OffsetIsNegative - when offset is negative.
        CountIsNotPositive - when count is not positive.
        RepositoryDisposed - when the repository was already disposed.
        RepositoryException - when an unexpected I/O error occurs.
        IStepWidgetRepository.OffsetIsNegative
        IStepWidgetRepository.CountIsNotPositive
        IStepWidgetRepository.RepositoryDisposed
        IStepWidgetRepository.RepositoryException

        public StepCountRecord GetRecordForDay(java.time.LocalDate dateOfDay)
                                throws IStepWidgetRepository.DateOfDayIsNull,
                                       IStepWidgetRepository.RepositoryDisposed,
                                       IStepWidgetRepository.RepositoryException
        Gets the record for a specified day.
        Specified by:
        GetRecordForDay in interface IStepWidgetRepository
        Parameters:
        dateOfDay - The specific day to get the record for.
        Returns:
        The record for the specified day. null when no step count was record for the day.
        Throws:
        DateOfDayIsNull - when dateOfDay is null.
        RepositoryDisposed - when the repository was already disposed.
        RepositoryException - when an unexpected I/O error occurs.
        IStepWidgetRepository.RecordNotFound - when no record was found fpr the day.
        IStepWidgetRepository.DateOfDayIsNull
